title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and cheese together in a bowl.
Toss drained pasta with pancetta, remove from heat, then quickly mix in egg-cheese mixture.
Season generously with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken pieces in a creamy spiced tomato sauce.
ingredients: Spices: garam masala, cumin, coriander, paprika
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and masala paste for 1-2 hours.
Grill or pan-sear chicken until charred.
Saute onion and spices, add tomato puree and simmer.
Stir in cream and add chicken.
Simmer 10 minutes and serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast Deluxe
summary: Toasted sourdough topped with smashed avocado, feta, and chili flakes.
steps: Mash avocado with lemon, salt, pepper.
Spread on toast, top with feta and chili flakes.
